components/products/feature-sidebar:
Flash Deals
{{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} {{> components/products/sidebar-carousel product_new_f=products_home products=products settings=../settings list="New Products"}} {{else}} {{> components/products/sidebar-carousel product_new_f=products_home products=products}} {{/if}}
components/products/sidebar-carousel:
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card-sidebar-sale theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating show_wishlist=../settings.show_wishlist productsnew=../productsnew}}
{{/each}}
components/products/top-sidebar:
{{lang 'categories.top_sellers'}}
{{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} {{> components/products/sidebar-carousel product_new_f=products_home products=products settings=../settings list="New Products"}} {{else}} {{> components/products/sidebar-carousel product_new_f=products_home products=products}} {{/if}}
components/themevale/home/sidebar:
<nav>
    <!-- All categories -->
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/side-all-categories}}
    <!-- Shop by price -->
   
    {{#if shop_by_brand}}
        {{> components/themevale/sidebar/side-shop-by-brand}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#if products.top_sellers}}
        {{> components/products/top-sidebar products=products.top_sellers products_new=products.new}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#if products.featured}}
        {{> components/products/feature-sidebar products=products.featured products_new=products.new}}
    {{/if}}

    {{> components/themevale/side-custom-block}}

</nav>
components/themevale/sidebar/side-all-ca:
Categories
{{#if categories}}
    {{#each categories}}
  • {{> components/common/navigation-list}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/themevale/sidebar/side-shop-b:
{{lang 'brand.label'}}
    {{#each (limit shop_by_brand 8)}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • {{lang 'common.view_all'}}
